summary: A player home within the world of Enderal. Located next to a cute pond and waterfall, this gives the player an option of a home not in Ark!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#3c78d8][center][size=6][b]Enderal Bluebird Cottage[/b][/size]
[size=3]A player home in the world of Enderal[/size][/center][/color]

[color=#93c47d]I love the homes in Ark city but i wanted a home out of the city away from the action. This adds a medium sized home for the player in the wilderness of Vyn and has everything you could possible need.[/color]

[b][color=#3d85c6][size=3]Where is the key?
[/size][/color][/b][color=#a4c2f4]When you first come across Bluebird Cottage the door will be locked and you must collect clues on where the previous owner has ended up! Their is no quest markers but its easy enough to figure out, i would look for a journal that the previous owner left at the front door in their hurry to sneak away from their home. The owner didn't get far before he was intercepted by highwaymen.[/color]

[size=3][b][color=#8e7cc3]Home Features
[/color][/b][/size]
[list]
[*][color=#b4a7d6][size=2]Alchemy Bench[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b4a7d6][size=2]Enchanting Table[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b4a7d6][size=2]Anvil[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b4a7d6][size=2]Tanning Rack[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b4a7d6][size=2]Grindstone[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b4a7d6][size=2]Cooking pot[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b4a7d6][size=2]Workbench[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b4a7d6][size=2]Bed for sleeping[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b4a7d6][size=2]Storage[/size][/color]
[*][color=#b4a7d6][size=2]Horse & Stable[/size][/color]
[/list]
[color=#c27ba0][size=3][b]Location[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#d5a6bd]The cottage has a map marker, I will upload a picture of the map so you know where to look for your future home. 
[/color][color=#6d9eeb]
[/color][b][center][b][color=#3d85c6][size=4][/size][/color][/b][color=#3d85c6][size=4]Recommended MODS[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80090/?][size=2][color=#6fa8dc]Ultimate Noble Beds. by Tsukinomi[/color]
[/size][/url][color=#9fc5e8][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80502/?]Enderal Extra Horses by SiennaGrace[/url][/color][/center][/b]

[color=#3c78d8][size=3][b]Credits[/b][/size][/color]
Thank you to SureAI who made [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77868/?]Enderal[/url] 
Thank you to all the [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mfVkU-UMXtM]Modders Recourses[/url] that where used in the creation of Enderal

[color=#cc0000][b]Important Update[/b]
[list]
[*]Please take any of your items stored in the house back into your inventory before updating to a newer version!
[/list]
Anyone using version 1.1 please update to version 1.02 - Fixed issue with accidentally editing meditation zone. No idea how it was effected, but fixed now! What happens when you stay up until 3:00AM in the creation kit i guess!

[/color][color=#cc4125]Version 1.3 - Nothing terribly important just a few changes in object placements you probably won't notice, it was frustrating me but you might have never picked up on it[/color].
author: Sienna
